short_description: fos barcelona is an ophthalmic, optical instruments & lenses supplier based in barcelona, spain.
long_description: fos is where culture, nature, cities and futures connect through a product. at fos barcelona we want to mimic nature where everything is in constant movement, transformation, and balance. fos barcelona is a brand that explores the current production and consumption systems, waste management systems and cultural habits around these through products that offer an extended vision about the meaning of quality. quality should go beyond the mere tangible properties of a product. it should include its wide impacts in society, economy and the environment. designing products that won't become waste at the end of its useful life, by replacing the current model of "take-fabricate-throw away" for a circular one. generating value from waste. producing locally and decentralized. helping people to be conscious of the responsibility and potential that we have as consumers. every act of consumption is a political choice. accelerate your journey on products manufacturing. sustainable eyewear handcrafted in barcelona.
business_tags: plastic waste | waste management system | design and tooling | design and engineering | tangible property | branding & design
generated_description: fos barcelona is a company based in barcelona, catalonia, specializing in the design and production of sustainable eyewear. the company focuses on creating eyewear that is beneficial for both society and the environment. fos barcelona emphasizes a circular production model, utilizing local waste to produce high-quality, lightweight, and recyclable sunglasses. their products are handcrafted, ensuring uniqueness and durability, and are designed to be easily repaired and recycled. the company also offers consultancy services to help other organizations adopt sustainable production practices.
generated_business_tags: circular design services | mould designing | waste management consulting | machine design | consultancy services | 100% recyclable eyewash frames | sustainable eyewear production
